name: sharp-sign
description: Run this with any number of strings as arguments and it will print them inside a frame. The width of the terminal is considered, strings longer than the with of the terminal are just split at maximum length.

scripts.test: npm run build && npm run setMonoPath  && npm run build-test && mono packages/NUnit.ConsoleRunner/tools/nunit3-console.exe sign.test.exe --noresult
scripts.br: npm run build && npm run run
scripts.bundle_all: npm run bundle_mac && npm run bundle_pi && npm run bundle_x64 && npm run bundle_local
scripts.clean: rm sign sign_mac sign_pi sign_x64 sign.exe FSharp.Core.dll

author: Claus Zirkel
